list.title: index.module:mjs
list.description:
Main Module

This is where the CLI tool is configured that calls all of the subordinate functions.

list.title: module:colspecUtilities
list.description:
Column Specification Utilities

These are functions for manipulating the column specification objects.

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.addNone
list.description: Adds the "None" choice to the beginning of choices lists for checkbox questions

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getColNames
list.description: Converts the col spec into an array of column names

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getColsToMangleChoices
list.description: Returns an array of column names that are candidates for being mangled in TARGET

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getColsWithNameVariants
list.description: Filters a col spec to just the columns with name variants

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getDateCols
list.description: Filters a col spec to just the columns with date values

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getDateColsChoices
list.description: Returns an array of column names for columns containing dates that are candidates for being changed in TARGET

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getFloatCols
list.description: Filters a col spec to just the columns with float values

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getFloatColsChoices
list.description: Returns an array of column names for columns containing floats that are candidates for being changed in TARGET

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getGeoCols
list.description: Filters a col spec to just the columns with lat/lon values

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getGeoColsChoices
list.description: Returns an array of column names for columns containing lat/lon that are candidates for being changed in TARGET

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getOptionalCols
list.description: Filters a col spec to just the optional columns

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getRequiredCols
list.description: Filters a col spec to just the required columns

list.title: module:colspecUtilities.getSelectedCols
list.description: Returns the colspec list selected by the user

list.title: module:generatorUtilities
list.description: Utility functions used to generate the test data.

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.addSmallValue
list.description: Takes a number and adds a small decimal amount to it by generating a random number [0, 1), multiplies it by 1000, rounds it, then multiplies by .0000001, to get, e.g. 0.0000342

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.convertToCsv
list.description: Takes a 2D array (array of rows) and converts it into CSV string format

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.mangleColumnNames
list.description: Takes a table as a 2D array, a list of columns to mangle and the specifications by which the columns were created (which contains column name variants). For each of the specified columns, a variant is chosen at random and converted to snake case. Then the whole table is returned.

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.mangleColumns
list.description: Takes a table as a 2D array, a list of columns to maybe mangle and the type of columns to be mangled. Returns the updated table with approximately 20% of the values in the mangled columns having new values.

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.mangleName
list.description: Returns a snake cased variant from the column names submitted

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.maybeAddSmallValue
list.description: Maybe adds a small amount to a float. Generates a random number [0, 1), multiplies it by 1000, rounds it, then multiplies by .0000001, to get, e.g. 0.0000342

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.maybeMangleDate
list.description: Maybe mangles a date by converting it into a different format than expected

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.maybeMangleGeo
list.description: Takes a latitude or longitude coordinate in decimal form. About 10% of the time it will add a small decimal amount to it. About 5% of the time it will add a very large amount to it putting it out of range for a valid lat/lon coordinate.

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.randomItem
list.description: Randomly select an item from an array of items

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.removeRandomRows
list.description: Removes some number of random rows from a table. It will NOT remove the header row.

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.shuffleColumns
list.description: Takes the original table and randomly reorders the columns. Keeps the ID column as the first columnn.

list.title: module:generatorUtilities.transpose
list.description: Transposes a 2D array, convert rows into columns or vice versa source: https://stackoverflow.com/a/52746426/296725

list.title: module:generators
list.description:
Generators

This module accepts a completed answers array and processes it to produce the test data sets based on a colspec.

list.title: module:generators.generate
list.description:
This is the main test data generation function. It orchestrates all of the test data generation and transformations and returns two 2D arrays, one for source and one for target, that contain the rows that will be later converted to CSV format for output.

Below are two examples:

  1. Intended usage in the context of an inquirer workflow, but this function can also be used as a "standalone" function
  2. A standalone example

list.title: module:generators.generateCsv
list.description: Takes an object that contains two 2D arrays for the source and target tables that represents the processed, completed values generated by the CLI tool. Returns the absolute paths to where the source and target CSV files should be written and also the CSV-formatted string content that should be written to those files.

list.title: module:generators~colspec
list.description: Remove optional columns from the column specification if these rows are not being generated

list.title: module:generators~generateHeaders
list.description: Generates (possibly mangled) headers from a colspec

list.title: module:generators~generateValues
list.description: Generate all of the values for given column specification

list.title: module:generators~generate~source
list.description: Generate the base SOURCE table with standard headers, column order and rowCount === max(SOURCE, TARGET) so rows can be removed from one later

list.title: module:generators~generate~target
list.description: deep clone SOURCE into TARGET

list.title: module:generators~source
list.description: Transpose 2D arrays from having each row be one column of data, all values having the same data type, to each row being one record as it will appear in the final output tables. Note that the header row is already in the correct format, so is handled differently.

list.title: module:questions
list.description: These are the collection of JSON objects representing the questions to be included in the CLI tool. The format is defined by the Inquirer library. See: https://www.npmjs.com/package/inquirer
